titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired of by the church-wardens and sworne men, within the archdeaconry of Worcester, in the first visitation of the R. Worshipfull Hugh Floyd Dr of Diuinity, Archdeacon of Worcester, anno Dom. 1624.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Archdeaconry of Worcester.
Floyd, Hugh.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield, and Iames Short, printers to the famous Vniuersity.,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, torn, and tightly bound, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Eton College. Library.
